Generation of HeLa TetOff-inducible Ago2 stable clones with WT or Mutant Pri-miRNAs
Prepare lentiviral constructs \(with selection marker of CopGFP) for expressing WT or Mutant pri-miRNAs.
Prepare HeLa TetOff-inducible Ago2 stable cells for second round lentivirus infection.
Maintain stable clones in selection medium with doxycycline \(500 ng/ml), G418 \(500 μg/ml) and puromycin \(1 μg/ml).
Rest cells for next round lentivirus infection.
Package Lenti-X \(Vector control, WT or Mutant pri-miRNAs) virus in 293T cells.
Transfect 293T cells with Lenti-X and package system as describe previously.
Subculture targeting cells \(HeLa TetOff-inducible Ago2 stable clones) using selection medium with doxycycline \(500
ng/ml), G418 \(500 μg/ml) and puromycin \(1 μg/ml).
The cell density should reach 25%-35% confluent at the time of infection.
Infect targeting cells with lentiviral supernatant.
Mix virus supernatant with fresh normal culture medium \(the ratio is determined by virus titer) supplemented with 500 ng/ml doxycycline gently.
Place the culture medium of targeting cells with the lentiviral mixture plus 6-10 μg /ml polybrene \(final concentration).
Transduce the targeting cells for 16-24 hr.
Place it with fresh normal culture medium supplemented with 500 ng/ml doxycycline for 24 hr recovery.
Keep GOI silence by adding doxycycline and
Select positive stable transfectants cultured in selection medium by cell sorting twice using
Rest cells in selection medium with 500 ng/ml doxycycline to
Enrich GFP-positive cells from each stable clone by
Flow cytometry and continue culture in selection medium with 500 ng/ml doxycycline.
Rest and expand the GFP-positive cells from each stable clone in selection medium with 500 ng/ml doxycycline.
Enrich GFP-positive cells from each stable clone again by cell sorting using
Continue culture in selection medium with 500 ng/ml doxycycline.
Test the exogenous expression of miRNAs in each stable transfectant.
Store all the stable transfectants in liquid nitrogen.
Determine Ago2-mediated miRNA maturation \(RNA structure dependent) in response to hypoxic stress

Subculture each HeLa TetOff-inducible Ago2 stable clone expressing WT or Mutant pri-miRNA \(e.g., miR-192 vs. miR-192-3M; miR-21-WT vs. miR-21-3M) into two dishes with identical cell density \(reach around 35%-45% confluent when
One was cultured in normal medium supplemented with Tet-Approved FBS plus doxycycline \(800 ng/ml for complete silencing with no leaky effect), G418 \(500 μg/ml) and puromycin \(1 μg/ml).
Another one was cultured in normal medium supplemented with Tet-Approved FBS plus G418 \(500 μg/ml) and puromycin \(1 μg/ml) with complete removal of doxycycline to
Critical: Trypsinized TetOff-inducible stable clones have to be washed several times with PBS to
Cells were cultured under normoxia overnight \(complete adherence and sufficient induction of GOI) before moving into hypoxia chamber \(INVIV O2 400, setting as 1% O2 and 5% CO2, RUSKINN).
Wash cells with PBS twice and immediately lyse cells in TRIzol inside of the hypoxia chamber after incubation for 24 hr.
Extract total RNA using TRIzol \(Invitrogen) or miRNeasy Mini Kit \(Qiagen).
Subject to Northern-blot analysis or qPCR using TaqMan MicroRNA assay kit \(Applied Biosystems).
